entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to scroll inner CollectionView of nested CollectionViews #26449
  • "java.exe" exited with code 1. #26442
  • Windows: Embedded Fonts doesn't work in Unpackaged apps #26441
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Carousel in Windows expands across the entire page. Works on Android perfectly. #26440
  • Keep Blazor Hybrid templates in sync with Blazor & MAUI #26439
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Flyout Content Template Does Not Dynamically Update on Windows #26435
  • Shell.FlyoutItemIsVisible on FlyoutItem in Shell binding does not update #26434
  • Border control behaves differently from Frame for the TappedGestureRecogniser #26433
  • Windows Navigation Animation jerky #26432
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] ImageButton configured with a `FontImageSource` do not respect size and padding #26431
    Backlog
  • [Windows, Android] App Crashes When changing the Group Item Visibility in CollectionView #26427
    Backlog
  • Grid invalid layout when using GridLength.Auto #26426
  • [WINDOWS, ANDROID] FlyoutIsPresented is not working as expected on Android and Windows when navigating between FlyoutItems #26422
  • Windows DatePicker doesn't fill container #26421
    Backlog
  • Layout.Clear doesn't detach content views properly #26420
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexMustBeLess Arg_ParamName_Name, index #26419
  • Navigation.PopModalAsync() - When popping a modal page off the stack and app loses focus - Modal Page does not leave the UI. #26418
  • The text entered in the Entry is not visible when using Handlers with BaseInputConnection while the Predictive Text option is enabled in the keyboard settings on Samsung devices. #26417
    Backlog

Closed

  • Similar name is provided for "Icons" Present: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26185
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Display Bug On iOS about BoxView that under initial InVisible Layout #22897
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [MAUI]The 'Pages' button text of G3 and G7 pages is black #25709
    .NET 9 SR2
  • .NET Maui Secondary ToolbarItem Issue on Windows #18258
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] Adding Toolbar item to ContentPage has unusual drop shadow on menu. #19166
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Editor autoscrolls its text view completely off the screen if you press 'return' too many times, has no constraint against scrolling the text view off screen. Objects lag in resizing around it. #17757
    Backlog
  • iOS hangs when choosing to Select All text on an Editor when AutoSize = TextChanges #25940
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Editor when entering a text which exceeds the maximum height resets the position #25938
    Backlog
  • Double tapping Editor control locks app when deployed to iPad. #25975
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [MAUI] Select items traces are preserved #26187
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [9.0] [iOS] [Regression] - ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always white. #25912
    .NET 9 SR2
  • CollectionViewHandler2 RelativeSource binding to AncestorType not working #26066
    .NET 9 SR2
  • ScrollView seem wrong with Border.Stroke Thickness change #26181
  • Error strip 139 with build net maui IOS vs 2022 net 9.0 #26430
  • Improve error message when users are referencing a .NET 9 NUGET from a .NET 8 TFM #25970
    .NET 9 SR2
  • ContentView is not getting invalidated when invoking the InvalidateMeasure() method in WinUI #26423
  • Application works in Debug build but crashes in Release build when binding ImmutableArray to ItemsSource with x:Static #24384
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25207
    .NET 9 SR2
  • XFDF File Type Not Functioning in Input Element on Blazor MAUI Android #26017
  • [Android .Net 9.0] Maui Hybrid input onkeydown not working anymore #25996
  • Button sizing broken by .NET9 when using the Mac UI Idiom #26154
  • CollectionView GroupHeaderTemplate controls inside incorrectly show/hide after reusing dataTemplate #26150
  • The Unloaded events of the page is not triggered when navigating to next page on android #26050
  • iOS tabbar not visible with 8.0.100 SR10 #26104

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleans up the blank starter template #26448
    community ✨
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241206202628657 to main #26444
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 37 #26437
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 36 #26436
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for Flyout reset during Detail update #26425
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Sample Content template: changed currentTheme value with RequestedTheme property. #26424
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Account for safeArea when re-positioning a footer #26416
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-flyout

Merged

  • [actions] update to inclusive-heat-sensor v0.1.2 #26443
  • Update Versions.props Release Branding .NET 9 SR2 #26446
  • Update Versions.props .NET 9 SR 3 #26447
  • Fix Similar name is provided for "Icons" Present #26331
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows][ Add correct menu bar item foreground resource override #26413
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed the double tap editor freeze issue and added test cases #26203
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix deselect item on CollectionView #26315
    area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS][Regression] Fix ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always default color #26048
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Add templated cells as children of the CollectionView2 #26357
    t/bug, area-controls-collectionview, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR2
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.2 to 1.0.3 #26406
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 35 #26404
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Add options for specifying a minimum workload version requirement #25993
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 32 #26380
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 34 #26403
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 33 #26402
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 31 #26379
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Change the yaml to build PR if lcl files were changed #26411
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 29 #26365
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 30 #26367
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 28 #26364
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [XC] Of course valuetype can implement interfaces #26400
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
    area-single-project, .NET 9 SR2

Updated

  • [iOS] CV - Reset ScrollOffset when item source changes #26376
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Set up MauiGResources for Localization #26412
    area-localization, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    community ✨
  • Add missing android font weight #25437
    platform/android 🤖, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` #26161
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #25852
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3

    platform/macOS 🍏, p/1, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix crash setting MenuFlyoutSubItem IconImageSource #26021
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, p/0, area-controls-flyout, .NET 9 SR3

    area-localization, .NET 9 SR3

    platform/iOS 🍎, p/1, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR3

    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR3

    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR3

    area-layout, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3

    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
